content: **enjoy an introductory discount of 50% off through 10/15/20 use code spiderweb** there is a video tutorial to accompany this written pattern left https //youtu be/6bfbv6y9x8g right https //youtu be/cha-sovvalw **you tube is your free version** description decorative spiderweb worked in one piece in rounds with 2 size options easy to decorate for halloween works up within a few hours material yarn hook and stitch marker use recommended hook size for your yarn i used small 6mm with single stranded #4 yarn approx 150 yds large 8mm hook with double stranded #4 yarn approx 400 yds you can also use double stranded for the small to make larger gauge no gauge necessary standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en
